        Returns:

      • get_randAsleep

        public boolean get_randAsleep(int p)
        Parameters:
        p - Integer variable meaning probability.
        Returns:
        Boolean of Sleeping State of the guard. Generates a random boolean, defined by probability p of the guard's sleeping condition.

      • get_randChangeDir

        public boolean get_randChangeDir(int p)
        Parameters:
        p - Integer variable meaning probability.
        Returns:
        Boolean of Changing direction of the guard. Generates a random boolean, defined by probability p of the guard's changing direction of movement.
